analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x7ea4afa739baea185b5c2c77f5676b69a7bae2a3.sol:
	Contract WeisToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x7ea4afa739baea185b5c2c77f5676b69a7bae2a3.sol#242-243)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
